Package model

Class StreamingSystem

java.lang.Object
model.StreamingSystem
public class StreamingSystem extends Object
StreamingSystem has most of the intern logic of the program. But it does not communicate with the user directly, its methods are called by the UserInterface class.

  • Method Details

    • searchAvailableSubscriberIndex

      public int searchAvailableSubscriberIndex()
      Returns the index of the first available (empty) index of the suscriptors array. If there is no available space it returns -1.
      Returns:
      index int corresponding to the available position of the array.

    • searchAvailableProductIndex

      public int searchAvailableProductIndex()
      Returns the index of the first available (empty) index of the products array. If there is no available space it returns -1.
      Returns:
      index int corresponding to the available position of the array.

    • verifySubscriberDocumentNumber

      public boolean verifySubscriberDocumentNumber(String document)
      Verifies if a subscriber's document number is unique in the system. Returns false if there are repeated identifications.
      Parameters:
      document - String corresponding to the document number to be validated.
      Returns:
      validation true only if the entered document number can be registered.

    • verifyProductName

      public boolean verifyProductName(String name)
      Verifies if a product's name is unique in the system. Returns false if there are repeated names.
      Parameters:
      name - String corresponding to the document number to be validated.
      Returns:
      validation true only if the entered document number can be registered.

    • addSubscriber

      public void addSubscriber(String documentNumber, String fullName, int age, int hoursToConsume, Type type, int index)
      Adds a subscriber object to the subscribers array. It needs all the attributes of the constructor of the class and it also needs an index or position of the array where store the object.
      Parameters:
      documentNumber - String corresponding to the number of the legal identification of a subscriber.
      fullName - String corresponding to the full name of a subscriber.
      age - int corresponding to the age of a subscriber.
      hoursToConsume - int corresponding to the number of hours a subscriber is willing to consume BlackSnail products.
      type - Type (enumeration of model package) which the determines the category of a subscriber.
      index - int corresponding to an available index of the suscriptor array.

    • addMovie

      public void addMovie(String name, String directorName, String synopsis, String originalTitle, String producer, int minimumAge, MovieCategory category, int dateDay, int dateMonth, int dateYear, int index)
      Adds a movie to the array. It needs the attributes of the classes it contains.
      Parameters:
      name - String.
      directorName - String.
      synopsis - String.
      originalTitle - String.
      producer - String.
      minimumAge - int.
      category - MovieCategory.
      dateDay - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Date object.
      dateMonth - int.It is an attribute of the neccesary Date object.
      dateYear - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Date object.
      index - int. It is automatically determined by the UserInteface class.

    • addSerie

      public void addSerie(String name, String directorName, String synopsis, String[] protagonists, int dateDay, int dateMonth, int dateYear, int seasonNumScheduledEpisodes, int seasonNumPublishedEpisodes, String seasonTrailerSource, int index)
      Adds a serie to the array. It needs the attributes of the classes it contains.
      Parameters:
      name - String.
      directorName - String.
      synopsis - String.
      protagonists - String[].
      dateDay - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Date object.
      dateMonth - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Date object.
      dateYear - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Date object.
      seasonNumScheduledEpisodes - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Season object.
      seasonNumPublishedEpisodes - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Season object.
      seasonTrailerSource - String. It is an attribute of the neccesary Season object.
      index - int. It is automatically determined by the UserInteface class.

    • getSubscriber

      public Subscriber getSubscriber(int index)
      Returns the subscriber object stored on an specific index of the subscriber array.
      Parameters:
      index - int corresponding to the position where the neccessary object is stored.
      Returns:
      Subscriber stored in the selected index.

    • getProduct

      public Product getProduct(int index)
      Returns the product object stored on an specific index of the subscriber array.
      Parameters:
      index - int corresponding to the position where the neccessary object is stored.
      Returns:
      Product stored in the selected index.

    • hasActiveSubscribers

      public boolean hasActiveSubscribers()
      Verififies if there exists at least one active subscriptor in the system.
      Returns:
      validation boolean, true only if the condition is satisfied.

    • hasProducts

      public boolean hasProducts()
      Verififies if there exists at least one product registered in the system.
      Returns:
      validation boolean, true only if the condition is satisfied.

    • hasSeries

      public boolean hasSeries()
      Verififies if there exists at least one serie registered in the system.
      Returns:
      validation boolean, true only if the condition is satisfied.

    • hasMovies

      public boolean hasMovies()
      Verififies if there exists at least one movie registered in the system.
      Returns:
      validation boolean, true only if the condition is satisfied.

    • deactivateSubscriber

      public void deactivateSubscriber(String documentNumber)
      Deactivates a subscriber. It will set the state to inactive and reset the type to normal.
      Parameters:
      documentNumber - document number of the subscriber to be deactivated.

    • searchSubscriber

      public Subscriber searchSubscriber(String documentNumber)
      Searches a specific subscriber object on the array based on his document number.
      Parameters:
      documentNumber - String corresponding to the identification of the subscriber to be located.
      Returns:
      foundSubscriber Subscriber with the entered document number.

    • searchProduct

      public Product searchProduct(String name)
      Searches a specific product object on the array based on his name. It is not case sensitive.
      Parameters:
      name - String corresponding to the name of the product to be located.
      Returns:
      foundProduct Product with the entered name.

    • searchSerieIndex

      public int searchSerieIndex(String name)
      Similar to the searchProduct method, but it returns the index of the found product and it only searches series.
      Parameters:
      name - String corresponding to the name of the serie to be located.
      Returns:
      index position (int) where the object is located inside the array.

    • getSubscribersInfo

      public String getSubscribersInfo()
      Returns the amount of subscribers of each type and a total.
      Returns:
      String message with the subscribers statistics.

    • getProductInfo

      public String getProductInfo(String name)
      Returns a message with the state of an specific product.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the product.
      Returns:
      info String message with the product information. It returns an error message if the object does not exist.

    • countSubscribers

      public int[] countSubscribers()
      Counts the amount of subscribers of each type and a total.
      Returns:
      count int[] with the subscribers statistics.

    • hasMinorActiveSubscribers

      public boolean hasMinorActiveSubscribers()
      Similar to hasActiveSubscribers but only for minors. It verifies if there is at least one active minor subscriptor in the system.
      Returns:
      boolean

    • getBestMinorSubscriberName

      public String getBestMinorSubscriberName()
      Returns the name of the minor subscriber with the longest amount of time willing to consume on BlackSnail.
      Returns:
      nameCarry String corresponding to the name of the found minor.

    • addSeasonToSerie

      public void addSeasonToSerie(int searchIndex, int numScheduledEpisodes, int numPublishedEpisodes, String trailerSource, int dateDay, int dateMonth, int dateYear)
      Adds a season to a serie. It perform all the necessary operations such as creating the Date and Season objects.
      Parameters:
      searchIndex - int. It is automatically determined by the UserInteface class.
      numScheduledEpisodes - int.
      numPublishedEpisodes - int.
      trailerSource - String.
      dateDay - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Season object.
      dateMonth - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Season object.
      dateYear - int. It is an attribute of the neccesary Season object.

    • getMovieListByCategory

      public String getMovieListByCategory(MovieCategory category)
      Returns a string in the form of a list with the movies that belong to the indicated category.
      Parameters:
      category - MovieCategory. It is the filter of the list.
      Returns:
      list String with the list.

    • getSeriesList

      public String getSeriesList()
      Returns a string in the form of a list with the registered series and the information of the last season of each one of them.
      Returns:
      list String with the list.

      public String toString()
      toString method. It returns the properties in human readable format.
